pages.text: You should have seen the two books in your inventory, and you're reading this one. Another one, the Akashic Tome has included all guidebooks in this modpack(except this one)
Now put this book and the Akashic Tome in the crafting grid to include this book in the tome. You can also put incomplete tome in crafting grid to get a full tome.
Right-click to choose a book, left-click to rest to cancel morphing, press SHIFT+Q to remove a book.
